title: (x) Reedshay flared sans serif - Optima {Stefan Johansson}
content:
Well, since replying to posts doesn't seem to work right now, I'll post this as a new thread.

In [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016093220/http:/typophile.com/node/21497), Wnf wanted a font ID'd.

The font is [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016093220/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=optima), unless I'm mistaken.
author: Termopolium
